answers.author: Derek Johnson
answers.text:
Shaun,
Here are a few reports from other municipal green waste recycling programs. They may help give you some ideas for how to craft your permits.
Elbert County Recycling and Greenwaste Project
www.cdphe.state.co.us/oeis/p2_program/grantreports/elbertcty09final.pdf
West Hawaii Greenwaste Diversion Program
www.co.hawaii.hi.us/.../2010-05-24%20Green%20Waste%20FAQs%20Brief-WH%20Final.pdf
City of Albuquerque Zero Waste Program
www.cabq.gov/cap/.../recycling-and...waste/CAPREV08forWEBRZW.pdf
Hope these help to get you started. Good luck!
Derek Johnson

author: Shaun Rao
text:
I am in search of policies or ordinances that implement a system for landscapers/homeowners to haul off the green waste they produce to specified locations. 
Also, does anyone have any insight on how permit for this type of system could be handled? Has there been systems similar in other cities that have seen positive results?
Any and all information is appreciated!
Thanks,
Shaun
title: Green waste Landscaper Recycling Program
